pair.title: BlauHoff Cloud
pair.intro: BlauHoff Cloud is a cloud service for BlauHoff devices. It provides a secure and reliable way to store your data.
pair.linktext: Click here to request your cloud details

modbus_pair.title: Connect to Modbus
modbus_pair.intro: Using Modbus to connect to your device requires you to have Modbus TCP enabled for your device and a ethernet cable connected.
modbus_pair.linktext: Click here to read more about connecting your modbus device to your network.
